descriptionHtml:
Description :
=============

Replace Aela The Huntres  with a  better looking one !! 
Replace the standard armor with the DB armor
Replace the long bow with a Deadric bow and arrow.

Version 0.1 : Add to inventory : 

Healing spell
Nightingale blade 
Gold  2500
Default outfit nightingale 
Scale 0.99
Health 200 
Essential off 
Add the nightingale armor without hood to the inventory .
 ...so you can dress her as you wish.... 


 Installation :
==============

The Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) is recommended for properly installing the mod. If you use NMM, just download and install!

 Uninstalling :
===============

Delete all the files you installed/use NMM to uninstall them. Or manually delete A Sexy Aela The Huntres Replacer v 1 from your Skyrim\\Data folder.

 Conflicts :
============

May conflict with any other mods that change  Aela The Huntres  !!!!
